statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT id, date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT id, prediction FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, date, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT id, date, product_id, sales_amount, prediction FROM sales_data WHERE id = 1001 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE prediction > 0.5 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT id, date, product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY id, date, product_id HAVING total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_sales DESC
SELECT MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales, MIN(sales_amount) AS min_sales FROM sales_data WHERE prediction IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales_data ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC;
SELECT * FROM predictive_models WHERE algorithm_used = 'Decision Tree';
SELECT model_name, dataset_used FROM predictive_models ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(DISTINCT sale_date) AS unique_dates FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY unique_dates DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(quantity_sold) AS avg_quantity, MAX(quantity_sold) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity_sold) AS min_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT model_name, algorithm_used FROM predictive_models WHERE model_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT date, predicted_sales FROM predictions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT date, product_id, predicted_sales FROM predictions WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT prediction_id, date, product_id, predicted_sales, confidence_level FROM predictions WHERE confidence_level > 80 ORDER BY predicted_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, ROUND(AVG(sales_amount), 2) AS average_sales FROM products JOIN sales_data ON products.product_id = sales_data.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT p.product_name, s.sales_amount FROM products p INNER JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY s.sales_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductData WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT date, sales_amount FROM HistoricalData WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT prediction_id, date, predicted_sales FROM PredictionData ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM ProductData WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, sales_amount, date FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductData WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT record_id, date, sales_amount FROM HistoricalData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT prediction_id, date, predicted_sales FROM PredictionData WHERE predicted_sales < 500 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM ProductDetails WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_address FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT analysis_date, trend_type, trend_value FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE trend_value < 0;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM SalesData WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_address FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM ProductDetails WHERE product_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, trend_type, trend_value FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-05-15' AND trend_value > 0 ORDER BY trend_value DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM PredictiveModel WHERE model_accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY model_name ASC;
